cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.19)
project(z)

set(OUR_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/..)

################ z ################

set(TARGET_NAME z)
set(SRC_DIR ${OUR_DIR})
set(PUBLIC_HDR_DIR ${OUR_DIR})
set(PRIVATE_HDR_DIR ${OUR_DIR})

set(PUBLIC_HDRS
        ${PUBLIC_HDR_DIR}/zconf.h
        ${PUBLIC_HDR_DIR}/zlib.h
)

set(PRIVATE_HDRS
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/crc32.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/deflate.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/gzguts.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/inffast.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/inffixed.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/inflate.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/inftrees.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/trees.h
        ${PRIVATE_HDR_DIR}/zutil.h
)

set(SRCS
        ${SRC_DIR}/adler32.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/compress.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/crc32.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/deflate.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/gzclose.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/gzlib.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/gzread.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/gzwrite.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/inflate.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/infback.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/inftrees.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/inffast.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/trees.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/uncompr.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/zutil.c
)

if (NOT MSVC)
    add_definitions(
            -Wno-implicit-function-declaration
            -Wno-shift-negative-value
    )
endif ()

add_library(${TARGET_NAME} STATIC ${PRIVATE_HDRS} ${PUBLIC_HDRS} ${SRCS})
target_include_directories(${TARGET_NAME} PUBLIC ${PUBLIC_HDR_DIR})
set_target_properties(${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTIES FOLDER Gx/External)

################ minizip ################

set(MINI_ZIP_SRCS
        ${SRC_DIR}/contrib/minizip/ioapi.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/contrib/minizip/mztools.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/contrib/minizip/unzip.c
        ${SRC_DIR}/contrib/minizip/zip.c
)

add_library(minizip STATIC ${MINI_ZIP_SRCS})
target_include_directories(minizip PUBLIC ${SRC_DIR}/contrib/minizip/)
target_link_libraries(minizip PUBLIC z)
set_target_properties(minizip PROPERTIES FOLDER Gx/External)
